description: Pro Guides London is a comprehensive mobile travel guide for your Palm device.  With an intuitive and attractive interface, it’s a great tool to help you have the best possible experience in London! You’ll find great tourism advice in the app.  What should you look for in restaurants and bars?  How do you choose your hotels or hostels?  What’s the best way to get around as a tourist?  What are the main sights, landmarks, attractions and activities to check out?  The answers to all these questions are in Pro Guides London! If you’re exploring London you owe it to yourself to download Pro Guides London to make sure you don’t miss a thing!
